subroutine compute_result3(x, result) integer, intent(in) :: x
    integer, intent(out) :: result
    integer :: current_x, i, sqrt_num
    current_x = x
    if (current_x /=2 .and. mod(current_x,2) ==0) then
        current_x = current_x +1
    end if
    do
        sqrt_num = nint(sqrt(real(current_x)))
        do i=3, sqrt_num, 2
            if (mod(current_x, i) ==0) then
                exit
            end if
        end do
        if (i > sqrt_num) then
            result = current_x
            return
        else
            current_x = current_x +2
        end if
    end do
end subroutine

subroutine compute_result1(K, result)
    integer, intent(in) :: K
    integer, intent(out) :: result
    integer :: tempK, remainder, ans
    if (mod(K,2) ==0 .or. mod(K,5) ==0) then
        result = -1
        return
    end if
    tempK = K
    if (mod(tempK,7) ==0) then
        tempK = tempK /7
    end if
    tempK = tempK *9
    ans =1
    remainder = mod(10, tempK)
    do while (remainder /=1)
        ans = ans +1
        remainder = mod(remainder *10, tempK)
    end do
    result = ans
end subroutine

Second, the check_leap function:

logical function check_leap(y)
    integer, intent(in) :: y
    if (mod(y,400) ==0) then
        check_leap = .true.
    else if (mod(y,4) ==0 .and. mod(y,100)/=0) then
        check_leap = .true. else
        check_leap = .false. end if
end function

Third, compute_result2:

subroutine compute_result2(y, result)
    integer, intent(in) :: y
    integer, intent(out) :: result
    logical :: leap_y, leap_i
    integer :: i, sum_days
    leap_y = check_leap(y)
    sum_days =0
    i = y +1
    do
        leap_i = check_leap(i)
        if (leap_i) then
            sum_days = sum_days +366
        else
            sum_days = sum_days +365
        end if
        if (mod(sum_days,7) ==0) then
            if ( (leap_i .eqv. leap_y) ) then
                result = i
                return
            end if
        end if
        i = i +1
    end do
end subroutine

Fourth, compute_result3:

subroutine compute_result3(x, result)
    integer, intent(in) :: x
    integer, intent(out) :: result
    integer :: current_x, i, sqrt_num
    current_x = x
    if (current_x /=2 .and. mod(current_x,2) ==0) then
        current_x = current_x +1
    end if
    do
        sqrt_num = nint(sqrt(real(current_x)))
        do i=3, sqrt_num, 2
            if (mod(current_x, i) ==0) then
                exit
            end if
        end do
        if (i > sqrt_num) then
            result = current_x
            return
        else
            current_x = current_x +2
        end if
    end do
end subroutine

    subroutine compute_result1(K, result)
        integer, intent(in) :: K
        integer, intent(out) :: result
        integer :: tempK, remainder, ans
        if (mod(K,2) ==0 .or. mod(K,5) ==0) then
            result = -1
            return
        end if
        tempK = K
        if (mod(tempK,7) ==0) then
            tempK = tempK /7
        end if
        tempK = tempK *9
        ans =1
        remainder = mod(10, tempK)
        do while (remainder /=1)
            ans = ans +1
            remainder = mod(remainder *10, tempK)
        end do
        result = ans
    end subroutine compute_result1

    logical function check_leap(y)
        integer, intent(in) :: y
        if (mod(y,400) ==0) then
            check_leap = .true.
        else if (mod(y,4) ==0 .and. mod(y,100)/=0) then
            check_leap = .true. else
            check_leap = .false.

        integer, intent(out) :: result

        leap_y = check_leap(y)

                    result = i
                    return
                end if
            end if
            i = i +1
        end do
    end subroutine compute_result2

    subroutine compute_result3(x, result)
        integer, intent(in) :: x
        integer, intent(out) :: result
        integer :: current_x, i, sqrt_num
        current_x = x
        if (current_x /=2 .and. mod(current_x,2) ==0) then

                end if
            end do
            if (i > sqrt_num) then
                result = current_x
                return
            else
                current_x = current_x +2
            end if
        end do
    end subroutine compute_result3
end program main

subroutine compute_result1(K, result)
    integer, intent(in) :: K
    integer, intent(out) :: result
    integer :: tempK, remainder, ans
    if (mod(K,2) ==0 .or. mod(K,5) ==0) then
        result = -1
        return
    end if
    tempK = K
    if (mod(tempK,7) ==0) then
        tempK = tempK /7
    end if
    tempK = tempK *9
    ans =1
    remainder = mod(10, tempK)
    do while (remainder /=1)
        ans = ans +1
        remainder = mod(remainder *10, tempK)
    end do
    result = ans
end subroutine

logical function check_leap(y)
    integer, intent(in) :: y
    if (mod(y,400) ==0) then
        check_leap = .true.
    else if (mod(y,4) ==0 .and. mod(y,100)/=0) then
        check_leap = .true.
    else
        check_leap = .false.

    integer, intent(out) :: result
    logical :: leap_y, leap_i

subroutine compute_result3(x, result)
    integer, intent(in) :: x
    integer, intent(out) :: result
    integer :: current_x, i, sqrt_num
    current_x = x
    if (current_x /=2 .and. mod(current_x,2) ==0) then
        current_x = current_x +1
    end if
    do
        sqrt_num = nint(sqrt(real(current_x)))
        do i=3, sqrt_num, 2
            if (mod(current_x, i) ==0) then
                exit
            end if
        end do
        if (i > sqrt_num) then
            result = current_x
            return
        else
            current_x = current_x +2
        end if
    end do
end subroutine

Now, putting all together in Fortran code.

The final Fortran program:

program main
    implicit none
    integer :: K, result1, result2, result3
    read(*,*) K
    call compute_result1(K, result1)
    call compute_result2(result1, result2)
    call compute_result3(result2, result3)
    write(*,*) result3
contains
    subroutine compute_result1(K, result)
        integer, intent(in) :: K
        integer, intent(out) :: result
        integer :: tempK, remainder, ans
        if (mod(K,2) ==0 .or. mod(K,5) ==0) then
            result = -1
            return
        end if
        tempK = K
        if (mod(tempK,7) ==0) then
            tempK = tempK /7
        end if
        tempK = tempK *9
        ans =1
        remainder = mod(10, tempK)
        do while (remainder /=1)
            ans = ans +1
            remainder = mod(remainder *10, tempK)
        end do
        result = ans
    end subroutine compute_result1

    logical function check_leap(y)
        integer, intent(in) :: y
        if (mod(y,400) ==0) then
            check_leap = .true.
        else if (mod(y,4) ==0 .and. mod(y,100)/=0) then
            check_leap = .true.
        else
            check_leap = .false.
        end if
    end function check_leap

    subroutine compute_result2(y, result)
        integer, intent(in) :: y
        integer, intent(out) :: result
        logical :: leap_y, leap_i
        integer :: i, sum_days
        leap_y = check_leap(y)
        sum_days =0
        i = y +1
        do
            leap_i = check_leap(i)
            if (leap_i) then
                sum_days = sum_days +366
            else
                sum_days = sum_days +365
            end if
            if (mod(sum_days,7) ==0) then
                if ( (leap_i .eqv. leap_y) ) then
                    result = i
                    return
                end if
            end if
            i = i +1
        end do
    end subroutine compute_result2

    subroutine compute_result3(x, result)
        integer, intent(in) :: x
        integer, intent(out) :: result
        integer :: current_x, i, sqrt_num
        current_x = x
        if (current_x /=2 .and. mod(current_x,2) ==0) then
            current_x = current_x +1
        end if
        do
            sqrt_num = nint(sqrt(real(current_x)))
            do i=3, sqrt_num, 2
                if (mod(current_x, i) ==0) then
                    exit
                end if
            end do
            if (i > sqrt_num) then
                result = current_x
                return
            else
                current_x = current_x +2
            end if
        end do
    end subroutine compute_result3
end program main
